ShortDescription: Olive Green Consulting isn't just an HR consulting firm; we're your trusted partner on the path to HR excellence. Since our journey began in April 2017, we've grown into a dynamic, globally-minded organization.
enhanced_description: Olive Green Consulting LLP is an HR consulting company established in April 2017, driven by a unique philosophy inspired by the highly efficient HR processes of the Indian Army, which manages 1.4 million personnel seamlessly across India. The company aims to bring this alternative perspective and disciplined approach, combined with extensive corporate experience across diverse domains, to its HR consulting solutions. They focus on developing 'Future-Ready' competencies within client organizations, aiming to improve employee happiness and engagement, boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and accelerate the filling of open positions. Olive Green Consulting offers core services in Organization & HR Consulting, Marketing & Branding Capability, and Program Management & Governance, positioning itself as a globally-minded partner for HR excellence.
